data.name: Vlad Voievod Dracula. Episode 1 Manhunt
data.detailed_description:
The events take place during the first ascension to the throne of Vlad Tepes (The Impaler). Aided by the Ottoman Turks, Dracula sets out to take his rightful throne from Basarab, the son of Dan, who murdered his family and stole the throne. Unable to face Dracula’s army, the Son of Dan flees north, to take shelter in the Bran Castle. But Dracula caught up with him near Bran, so the manhunt begins! 



The game uses an instant death-restart mechanic, where you infinitely respawn in the current scene, with no progress lost, no game over screen, and you’re not forced to replay previously mastered scenes. 

You can customize Dracula’s appearance and weapons, and you can play in different difficulties: less challenge unlocks less content, and more challenge unlocks more content: more levels, more intense challenges, more powerful enemies, more weapons and skins, more ammo, more playable characters, more detailed plot.



You won’t overcome all obstacles too easily. Dracula’s main attack is not very powerful, and you can’t take out all your enemies head-on, some are faster than you, and more powerful. You’ll need to mind your ammo, and wisely use your throwing weapons, carefully use your knights knowing their strengths and weaknesses. Sometimes you might engage in small duels, so learn to back down when needed and strike merciless when the opportunity arrives.



So buckle up and take control of one of the coolest villains in history in his manhunt for judgement and revenge. Use skill and cold-blooded planning to crush the enemies beneath your feet just to raise them back up in pales. Pick up the sword, and let the manhunt begin!

data.short_description: A tactical action platformer where you play as Vlad “the Impaler”, the historical Dracula, the Lord and Voievod (war commander) of Wallachia. With your knights, you explore medieval Romania (Wallachia, Transylvania and Moldova) castle by castle, to hunt down your enemies!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Win 7 or better
  • Processor: intel i3 or better
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: WebGL compatible
  • Storage: 400 MB available space

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: MacOS Sierra 10.12.6 or better
  • Processor: intel i5 or better
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: WebGL compatible
  • Storage: 400 MB available space

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 20.04
  • Processor: intel i3 or better
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: WebGL compatible
  • Storage: 400 MB available space

data.legal_notice: © Copyright 2021 Tiberiu Ghinet. All rights reserved.

content_descriptors.notes: The game contains violence, gore, torture and nudity. You play as Vlad Dracula aka Vlad "the Impaler" so impaling and other forms of torture, sometimes mixed with nudity, will be seen in the game.
